content: this is the original pattern from 2014 tip jars paypal craftasaurustex@gmail com cashapp $craftasaurustex patreon craftasaurustex formerly nichole s nerdy knots social media @craftasaurustex original description oogie boogie stands at about 10 inches tall when finished using a 4 25mm hook oogie s mouth is a pocket to stuff bugs into i used red heart yarn in buff fleck oogie boogie requires you to crochet back and forth using an interesting stitch to make it look like it s crocheted in the round instead of flat this is optional you can crochet him back and forth normally and he ll just have the row lines if you want substitute regular single crochets for the mirror rounds if you have any questions about the pattern please ask spanish translation was available at https //crochetcreativo com/oogie-boogie-amigurumi-patron-gratis/
